=== Testing NEW FLEXIBLE Script Generation ===

1. DEFAULT SETTINGS:
   input_items=ON, env_vars_dict=OFF
#!/usr/bin/env python3
# Auto-generated script for n8n Python Function (Raw)

import json
import sys

# Environment variables (from credentials and system)
API_KEY = 'secret123'
DB_HOST = 'localhost'
PORT = '5432'

# Individual variables from first input item
name = 'test'
value = 123

# Legacy compatibility objects
input_items = [{'name': 'test', 'value': 123}]
# User code starts here
print('Hello world')

============================================================

2. BOTH LEGACY OBJECTS:
   input_items=ON, env_vars_dict=ON
#!/usr/bin/env python3
# Auto-generated script for n8n Python Function (Raw)

import json
import sys

# Environment variables (from credentials and system)
API_KEY = 'secret123'
DB_HOST = 'localhost'
PORT = '5432'

# Individual variables from first input item
name = 'test'
value = 123

# Legacy compatibility objects
input_items = [{'name': 'test', 'value': 123}]
env_vars = {'API_KEY': 'secret123', 'DB_HOST': 'localhost', 'PORT': '5432'}
# User code starts here
print('Hello world')

============================================================

3. ONLY ENV_VARS DICT:
   input_items=OFF, env_vars_dict=ON
#!/usr/bin/env python3
# Auto-generated script for n8n Python Function (Raw)

import json
import sys

# Environment variables (from credentials and system)
API_KEY = 'secret123'
DB_HOST = 'localhost'
PORT = '5432'

# Individual variables from first input item
name = 'test'
value = 123

# Legacy compatibility objects
env_vars = {'API_KEY': 'secret123', 'DB_HOST': 'localhost', 'PORT': '5432'}
# User code starts here
print('Hello world')

============================================================

4. NO LEGACY OBJECTS:
   input_items=OFF, env_vars_dict=OFF
#!/usr/bin/env python3
# Auto-generated script for n8n Python Function (Raw)

import json
import sys

# Environment variables (from credentials and system)
API_KEY = 'secret123'
DB_HOST = 'localhost'
PORT = '5432'

# Individual variables from first input item
name = 'test'
value = 123

# User code starts here
print('Hello world')

============================================================

5. HIDDEN VALUES:
   input_items=ON, env_vars_dict=ON, hide=ON
#!/usr/bin/env python3
# Auto-generated script for n8n Python Function (Raw)

import json
import sys

# Environment variables (from credentials and system)
API_KEY = "***hidden***"
DB_HOST = "***hidden***"
PORT = "***hidden***"

# Individual variables from first input item
name = "***hidden***"
value = "***hidden***"

# Legacy compatibility objects
input_items = "***hidden***"
env_vars = "***hidden***"
# User code starts here
print('Hello world')
